problem_names:
lemma transfers_split:
  "(transfers (ets@ets') s) = (transfers ets' (transfers ets s))"

lemma preds_split:
  "(preds (ets@ets') s) = (preds ets s \<and> preds ets' (transfers ets s))"

lemma transfers_id_no_influence:
  "transfers [et \<leftarrow> ets. et \<noteq> \<Up>id] s = transfers ets s"

lemma preds_True_no_influence:
  "preds [et \<leftarrow> ets. et \<noteq> (\<lambda>s. True)\<^sub>\<surd>] s = preds ets s"
translations:
lemma transfers_split:
  "(transfers (ets@ets') s) = (transfers ets' (transfers ets s))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. transfers (ets @ ets') s = transfers ets' (transfers ets s)

lemma preds_split:
  "(preds (ets@ets') s) = (preds ets s \<and> preds ets' (transfers ets s))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. preds (ets @ ets') s = (preds ets s \<and> preds ets' (transfers ets s))

lemma transfers_id_no_influence:
  "transfers [et \<leftarrow> ets. et \<noteq> \<Up>id] s = transfers ets s"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. transfers (filter (\<lambda>et. et \<noteq> \<Up>id) ets) s =
    transfers ets s

lemma preds_True_no_influence:
  "preds [et \<leftarrow> ets. et \<noteq> (\<lambda>s. True)\<^sub>\<surd>] s = preds ets s"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. preds
     (filter (\<lambda>et. et \<noteq> (\<lambda>s. True)\<^sub>\<surd>)
       ets)
     s =
    preds ets s
